titles.title: Bridge Spending Accountability, Flexibility, and Efficiency Act of 2007

To amend title 23, United States Code, to authorize a State that has a structurally deficient bridge within its boundaries to obligate funds made available to carry out a high priority project for any project or activity eligible for assistance under title 23, United States Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
10/23/2007--Introduced.
Bridge Spending Accountability, Flexibility, and Efficiency Act of 2007 - Authorizes a state to obligate certain apportioned high priority project funds for projects to improve structurally deficient bridges located within the state.
